ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Georgia
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, another SWG convert. I haven t picked up EQ in about 3 weeks now. Still like reading the EQ sites and getting the mail, though. Hard to give up on a game
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, another SWG convert. I haven't picked up EQ in
about 3 weeks now.

Still like reading the EQ sites and getting the mail,
though. Hard to give up on a game that took up so many
years of my life. :D

Melanie

--- Jerry O'Connor <dsnywrldlvr@...> wrote:
>
>
> Well I'm not in Georgia but sort of close . I live
> in Charlotte, NC. And unfortunately I haven't been
> playin EQ that much since I got SWG. I do miss it
> but got the new addiction right now. Main is
> Freelight on Tribunal. Jerry
